content: rnds 27 to 29 18 single_crochet around place safety eyes between 26th and 27th rounds four spaces apart - round 30 1 single_crochet decrease 6 times 12 single_crochet - round 31 decrease 6 times 6 single_crochet fo and sew closed part 2 baby nightcrawler the baby nightcrawler is made using the same methods as its papa just smaller legs make 2 - round 1 mc 4 single_crochet - round 2 increase 4 times 8 single_crochet - rnds 3 to 7 8 single_crochet around - round 8 increase 7 single_crochet 9 single_crochet - round 9 increase 8 single_crochet 10 single_crochet on first leg mark 2nd st in the round by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product again do not fo second leg you will work off of it to join to the first stuff the legs with filling and continue to do so as you work up the body body - round 10 2 sl chain 1 off second leg single_crochet to first leg on marked st 3 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet single_crochet in loop of chain 4 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet single_crochet in other loop of chain 20 single_crochet - round 11 20 single_crochet around - round 12 4 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 18 single_crochet - round 13 7 single_crochet decrease twice 16 single_crochet - round 14 3 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet 14 single_crochet - round 15 5 single_crochet decrease twice 12 single_crochet - rnds 16 to 17 12 single_crochet around place safety eyes between 16th and 17th rounds about four spaces apart - round 18 4 single_crochet decrease twice 10 single_crochet - round 19 decrease 5 times 5 single_crochet fo and sew closed fin by frances @ justtoomuchyarn pattern is for the personal use of the purchasing customer only this pattern or its components are not to be sold or reproduced by anyone outside of the creator or her influence under any circumstances finished products may be shared online or sold in limited number by the pattern purchaser with appropriate credit to justtoomuchyarn in the piece description and attached to finished product
